Crawler Exceptions

exception crawler.web_crawler.CrawlerExceptions.RobotParseException(message: str)

Custom exception raised when there is an error parsing a robots.txt file.

add_note()

Exception.add_note(note) – add a note to the exception

args
with_traceback()

Exception.with_traceback(tb) – set self.__traceback__ to tb and return self.

exception crawler.web_crawler.CrawlerExceptions.URLParseException(message: str)

Custom exception raised when a URL could not be parsed.

add_note()

Exception.add_note(note) – add a note to the exception

args
with_traceback()

Exception.with_traceback(tb) – set self.__traceback__ to tb and return self.
